recipesJson.name: Cupid's Cream
recipesJson.author: Deetzz
recipesJson.description:
This is a White Chocolate Strawberry dessert with a Rich & Creamy pudding filling wrapped up in the pink of Strawberries! Im pretty sure this is what Cupid Vapes :-)

I wanted to create something sexy and delicious for my Wifey for Vday and ended up with this seductive little mix. I enjoy White chocolate specifically so figured I will build a profile around this.
The combo of the White Chocolate & Vanilla Pudding is the main here, I wanted that delicious and full White Chocolate pudding pushing in front and also leaves its trail of deliciousness on the exhale.

The good 'ol combo of Shisha strawb and Strawb Ripe was my go-to strawberries used here to bring in some color and depth into this mix... that and Strawberries are sexy! 
Shisha Brings that sweet syrupy strawberry goo and Strawberry Ripe broadens the Strawberry profile up a bit more with that real Ripe fruit flavor.

Next , smoothness! I used Miss Cream to blend and cream things up. I like Miss Cream as it brings that true sweet desserty type of cream. It has that Fudge or caramelized sugar notes floating around in it.
And then Finally, I used Hazelnut here to assist with the above cream profile, so this is not full on hazelnut Flavor but instead a mysterious component in this mix that just makes everything better! 

Sweetener- I added 0.3 CAP SS, I would recommend adding it, but is sweet without it too, your choice.

Best after recommended steep, but if you can let it go to day 14
